# Structural Event Analysis <img src="man/figures/logo.png" align="right" width="50">

<!-- badges: start -->

[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/acastroaraujo/seaR/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/acastroaraujo/seaR/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml)

<!-- badges: end -->

The objective of structural event analysis is to model the number of groups matching some set of compositional characteristics, considering _all possible_ groups (not just those that actually form).

## Installation

You can install the development version of seaR from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("acastroaraujo/seaR")
```
